content: dr julia riede photography julia riede all rights reserved for personal use only v2016 02 28 knit the 11 ds then work in stockinette stitch to end of boyfriend socks 3 round next row rs knit the 11 double stitches k11 turn next row ws mds k11 turn next row rs mds k until you reach the double stitch knit the double and the following stitch turn next row ws mds p until you reach the double stitch purl the double and the following stitch turn repeat the last two row until you have one double stitch at one end and a double stitch and one stitch to knit left at the other side turn next row rs knit the double stitch k31 leg leg round 1 knit all stitches continue as established until desired length cuff cuff round 1 k2 p2 to end repeat the last round 11 times more © 2016 jriede com / dr julia riede photography julia riede all rights reserved for personal use only v2016 02 28 finishing boyfriend socks 4 weave in ends and block gently about the author abbreviations pm place marker julia jriede on ravelry is a knitwear designer sl slip and nuclear physicist her website and blog can k knit tbl through back loop be found on www jriede com p purl decrease together sts stitches kw knitwise yo yarn over kfb knit into front & back of co cast on stitch ssk slip slip knit kfbf knit into front & back of k2tog knit two stitches together stitch then into front again p2tog purl two stitches together ktbl knit through back loop bobble bind off ptbl purl through back loop twitter @jriedeknits slm slip marker instagram @jriedeknits facebook facebook com/jriedeknitweardesign © 2016 jriede com / dr julia riede photography julia riede all rights reserved for personal use only v2016 02 28
